name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Death Wink Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Ivankov demonstrates his incredible Death Wink technique by stopping a cannon shot with just a wink, creating a powerful shockwave.
keyMoments.significance: First full demonstration of Ivankov's signature Death Wink technique in combat.

keyMoments.title: Gender Transformation Ability Revealed
keyMoments.description: Ivankov demonstrates his hormone-based gender transformation ability by transforming a pirate into a woman.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals one of the unique applications of the Horu Horu no Mi Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Healing Hormones Debut
keyMoments.description: Ivankov begins treating Luffy with his Healing Hormones technique, explaining that it will take 10 years off Luffy's lifespan but only works on those with extraordinary willpower.
keyMoments.significance: First use of the Healing Hormones technique, one of the most significant medical abilities in the series.
keyMoments.quote: This treatment will take 10 years off your life! Only those with an extraordinary will to live can survive it!

abilities.description: A powerful wink that creates a shockwave capable of deflecting cannon fire.
Special hormones that stimulate the immune system to fight deadly poisons, but take years off the patient's lifespan.
Hormones that can change a person's biological sex.

relationships.description: Ivankov respects Luffy's willpower and compassion, agreeing to treat him despite the time constraints.
Ivankov saved Bon Clay at Luffy's request, establishing a connection between them.

reveals.information: Healing Hormones technique used for the first time

keyMoments.title: Childhood Flashback with Ace
keyMoments.description: A flashback shows young Luffy and Ace together by the ocean, highlighting their close bond as brothers.
keyMoments.significance: First glimpse of Luffy and Ace's childhood during the Impel Down arc, reinforcing Luffy's motivation.

keyMoments.title: Undergoes Healing Hormones Treatment
keyMoments.description: Luffy's body undergoes the Healing Hormones treatment, sacrificing 10 years of his lifespan to survive Magellan's poison.
keyMoments.significance: Permanent sacrifice of lifespan demonstrates Luffy's determination to save Ace at any cost.

reveals.information: Flashback of childhood with Ace by the ocean
Loses 10 years of lifespan to Healing Hormones treatment

keyMoments.title: Desperate Plea for Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bon Clay desperately pleads with Ivankov to save Luffy's life, showing his deep friendship and loyalty.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bon Clay's complete transformation from enemy to devoted friend.
keyMoments.quote: Please save Luffy! I'll do anything!

relationships.description: Bon Clay considers Luffy a precious friend and is willing to do anything to save him.

evolutionMoments.description: Bon Clay desperately pleads with Ivankov to save Luffy's life, demonstrating the depth of their friendship.

relationships.description: Ivankov saved Bon Clay's life at Luffy's request.

reveals.information: Ivankov saved Bon Clay because Luffy begged him to

keyMoments.title: Wolf Encounter in Level 5
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Galdino encounter fierce wolves while fleeing through Level 5 on wax stilts.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the comedic subplot of Buggy's escape attempt.

keyMoments.title: Wolf Encounter in Level 5
keyMoments.description: Galdino and Buggy encounter fierce wolves while fleeing through Level 5 on wax stilts.
keyMoments.significance: Continues the comedic subplot of the escape attempt.

keyMoments.title: Bellett's Debut
keyMoments.description: Bellett appears as a member of the Newkama Land community.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction to the Newkama Land community.

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Childhood Flashback with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Ace appears in a flashback as a child with Luffy by the ocean, showing their close brotherly bond.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces Ace's importance to Luffy and the motivation behind his Impel Down mission.

statusHistory.context: Imprisoned in Impel Down, awaiting execution
